faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.et: Kursus on üles ehitatud häälikurühmade kaupa. Kursuse käigus omandatakse ja harjutatakse vastavat sõnavara, erisümboleid, sõnastiku kasutamist ja vajalikke hääldusreegleid.

independent_work.et: Progress tests, assignments and home works, quizzes and presentations, oral test

grade_preconditions.et: Submit all assignments and home works, participate in ongoing assessments and participate in class room activities

grade_evaluation.et: Oral presentations, assignments and homeworks,  progress tests

debt_elimination.et: Students can take exams at later date in case of illness or exceptional circumstances after consulting the lecturer
